songs.title: Doing It (Remix)
songs.lyrics:
#AnothaATracc

[Chorus: Charli XCX]
We're staying all night
We never slow down
I think we better do it like we're doing it now
It's been a long time
Since we've been around
So come on, let's keep doing it like we're doing it
Doing it like we're doing it now
Keep doing it like we're doing it
Doing it like we're doing it

[Verse 1: Perfecct]
Know, it's been a long-long time
But I'm already back for a while, and
I gatta be honest, thought that I will never see ya
Biggest mistake for me to make was to leave ya

Now I can put your pretty butt in a Range
Go anywhere, there's nothing I can't arrange
Yeah, I could have called many times before I just gon' walk in
Let you know that I miss you, but well ... (yeah)

Hope you can leave it in the past
Simply believe me when I tell you that we'll last
And even if your feelings are gone
We have time till the end of this song (Ay)
(It's Perfecct)

[Chorus]

[Verse 2: Rita Ora]
Friends like a team in a circle
We're together we're so alive
Yeah together we're so alive
Joy like a jewel, let it sparkle
Know that I got your back for life
Yeah I got your back for life

[Pre-Chorus: Rita Ora]
Locked inside my veins you're in my blood, in my blood (oh, yeah)
And we're united forevermore

[Chorus] x2

[Bridge: Charli XCX]
All night long
We dancing to this song
We doing it, we going on and on
On and on
All night long
We dancing to this song
We doing it, we going on and on
On and on

[Chorus]

[Hook]
All night long we dancing to this song
Keep doing it like we're doing it
Doing it like we're doing it now
All night long we dancing to this song
Keep doing it like we're doing it
Doing it like we're doing it now

[Chorus]

[Outro]
C-X, Rita Ora, T-A, baby
C-X, Rita Ora, T-A (Ay, Ay)
